tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thanks to dr Anviti & dr Nishita.....My treatment is going on for RCT and was afraid for pain initially but dr is vry frndly and do the treatment vry easily according to our paitience,capacity.....i dint even suffer from pain while doing the treatment & got explained vry nicely abt infection and wat treatment done exactly by the dr.....also they always available during our critical time or ny emergency or any question.....I liked that clinic is open with taking all precautions during this pandemic situation also hence no paitient will suffer for long time.....I will highly recommend everyone to go for any problem related to teeth with no any doubt and do always smile :)
reply_text: Thank you for the positive feedback. We look forward to serve you similarly for all your dental needs in future :)

review:
Clinic follows strict safety protocols. Managing appointments and timeliness scores high. Doctor is skilled and experienced and to the point explaining the issues and very good with the treatment.
Payment options are flexible with almost all digital options available. Overall great experience.

context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,
review: My front tooth had decayed pretty badly, we had to opt for root canal, as its the front tooth it was really essential for the cap to match the rest of the teeth, which it eventually did.  Now, cannot even tell that it is a cap. Blends in really well. Did a lot of other fillings and cleaning too. They were really friendly, and understanding of the pandemic situation by taking the necessary preventive measures. Honestly, worth the time and money :)
reply_text: Thank you for the positive feedback. Looking forward to serve you and your family for all your dental needs in future !
